table.name: import_vw_manhole
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT ON (ws.obj_id) ws.obj_id, ws.identifier, COALESCE(wn.situation3d_geometry, main_co.situation3d_geometry) AS situation_geometry, main_co.cover_shape AS co_shape, main_co.diameter AS co_diameter, main_co.material AS co_material, main_co.positional_accuracy AS co_positional_accuracy, main_co.level AS co_level, ws._depth, wn._usage_current AS _channel_usage_current, ma.material AS ma_material, ma.dimension1 AS ma_dimension1, ma.dimension2 AS ma_dimension2, CASE WHEN (ma.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'manhole'::text WHEN (ss.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'special_structure'::text WHEN (dp.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'discharge_point'::text WHEN (ii.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'infiltration_installation'::text ELSE 'unknown'::text END AS ws_type, ma.function AS ma_function, ss.function AS ss_function, ne.remark, wn.bottom_level AS wn_bottom_level, NULL::text AS photo1, NULL::text AS photo2, NULL::smallint AS inlet_3_material, NULL::integer AS inlet_3_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS inlet_3_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS inlet_4_material, NULL::integer AS inlet_4_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS inlet_4_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS inlet_5_material, NULL::integer AS inlet_5_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS inlet_5_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS inlet_6_material, NULL::integer AS inlet_6_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS inlet_6_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS inlet_7_material, NULL::integer AS inlet_7_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS inlet_7_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS outlet_1_material, NULL::integer AS outlet_1_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS outlet_1_depth_m, NULL::smallint AS outlet_2_material, NULL::integer AS outlet_2_clear_height, NULL::numeric(7,3) AS outlet_2_depth_m, false AS verified, (q.obj_id IS NOT NULL) AS in_quarantine, false AS deleted FROM ((((((((tww_od.wastewater_structure ws LEFT JOIN tww_od.cover main_co ON (((main_co.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_cover)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.manhole ma ON (((ma.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.special_structure ss ON (((ss.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.discharge_point dp ON (((dp.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.infiltration_installation ii ON (((ii.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT import_manhole_quarantine.obj_id, max(import_manhole_quarantine.quarantine_serial) AS maximum FROM tww_od.import_manhole_quarantine GROUP BY import_manhole_quarantine.obj_id) q ON (((q.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: swmm_link_results
table.viewSql: SELECT ne.fk_wastewater_structure AS ws_obj_id, re.obj_id AS re_obj_id, re.clear_height, re.material, mp.obj_id AS mp_obj_id, mp.remark AS swmm_simulation_name, md.obj_id AS md_obj_id, ms.obj_id AS ms_obj_id, ms.dimension, ms.remark AS swmm_parameter, mr.obj_id AS mr_obj_id, mr.measuring_duration, mr."time", mr.value, re.progression3d_geometry AS geom FROM (((((tww_od.reach re JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((re.obj_id)::text = (ne.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measuring_point mp ON (((mp.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measuring_device md ON (((md.fk_measuring_point)::text = (mp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measurement_series ms ON (((ms.fk_measuring_point)::text = (mp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measurement_result mr ON (((mr.fk_measurement_series)::text = (ms.obj_id)::text))) WHERE (md.remark = 'SWMM Simulation'::text) ORDER BY mp.obj_id, mr."time";

table.name: swmm_node_results
table.viewSql: SELECT ws.obj_id AS ws_obj_id, mf.vsacode AS ma_function, ssf.vsacode AS ss_function, mp.obj_id AS mp_obj_id, mp.remark AS swmm_simulation_name, md.obj_id AS md_obj_id, ms.obj_id AS ms_obj_id, ms.dimension, ms.remark AS swmm_parameter, mr.obj_id AS mr_obj_id, mr.measuring_duration, mr."time", mr.value, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom FROM (((((((((tww_od.wastewater_structure ws JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.manhole ma ON (((ma.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.manhole_function mf ON ((mf.code = ma.function))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.special_structure ss ON (((ss.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.special_structure_function ssf ON ((ssf.code = ss.function))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measuring_point mp ON (((mp.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measuring_device md ON (((md.fk_measuring_point)::text = (mp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measurement_series ms ON (((ms.fk_measuring_point)::text = (mp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.measurement_result mr ON (((mr.fk_measurement_series)::text = (ms.obj_id)::text))) WHERE (md.remark = 'SWMM Simulation'::text) ORDER BY mp.obj_id, mr."time";

table.name: swmm_vw_aquifers
table.viewSql: SELECT aq.obj_id AS name, 0.5 AS porosity, 0.15 AS wiltingpoint, 0.30 AS fieldcapacity, 5.0 AS conductivity, 10.0 AS conductivityslope, 15.0 AS tensionslope, 0.35 AS upperevapfraction, 14.0 AS lowerevapdepth, 0.002 AS lowergwlossrate, aq.minimal_groundwater_level AS bottomelevation, aq.average_groundwater_level AS watertableelevation, 0.3 AS unsatzonemoisture, NULL::text AS upperevappattern FROM tww_od.dss15_aquifer aq;

table.name: swmm_vw_conduits
table.viewSql: SELECT re.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(from_wn.obj_id, (concat('from_node@', re.obj_id))::character varying) AS fromnode, COALESCE(to_wn.obj_id, (concat('to_node@', re.obj_id))::character varying) AS tonode, CASE WHEN ((re.length_effective <= 0.01) AND (st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) <= (0.01)::double precision)) THEN (0.01)::double precision WHEN ((re.length_effective <= 0.01) AND (st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) >= (0.01)::double precision)) THEN st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) WHEN ((re.length_effective IS NULL) AND (st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) <= (0.01)::double precision)) THEN (0.01)::double precision WHEN ((re.length_effective IS NULL) AND (st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) >= (0.01)::double precision)) THEN st_length(re.progression3d_geometry) ELSE (re.length_effective)::double precision END AS length, CASE WHEN (re.coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL) THEN ((1)::double precision / (re.coefficient_of_friction)::double precision) WHEN ((re.coefficient_of_friction IS NULL) AND (re.wall_roughness IS NOT NULL)) THEN CASE WHEN (re.clear_height IS NOT NULL) THEN (('1'::numeric / ((((('4'::numeric * sqrt(9.81)))::double precision * power((('32'::numeric)::double precision / ((re.clear_height)::double precision / ('1000'::numeric)::double precision)), (('1'::numeric)::double precision / ('6'::numeric)::double precision))) * log((((3.71)::double precision * ((re.clear_height)::double precision / ('1000'::numeric)::double precision)) / ((re.wall_roughness / '1000'::numeric))::double precision))))::numeric(7,4)))::double precision WHEN ((re.clear_height IS NULL) AND (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL)) THEN ((1)::double precision / (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction)::double precision) ELSE (0.01)::double precision END WHEN ((re.coefficient_of_friction IS NULL) AND (re.wall_roughness IS NULL)) THEN CASE WHEN (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL) THEN ((1)::double precision / (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction)::double precision) ELSE (0.01)::double precision END ELSE (0.01)::double precision END AS roughness, COALESCE((rp_from.level - from_wn.bottom_level), (0)::numeric) AS inletoffset, COALESCE((rp_to.level - to_wn.bottom_level), (0)::numeric) AS outletoffset, 0 AS initflow, 0 AS maxflow, concat_ws(';'::text, ws.identifier, CASE WHEN (re.coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL) THEN '1 / K_Strickler, 1/re.coefficient_of_friction is used as roughness'::text WHEN ((re.coefficient_of_friction IS NULL) AND (re.wall_roughness IS NOT NULL)) THEN CASE WHEN (re.clear_height IS NOT NULL) THEN 'The approximation of 1 / K_Strickler is computed from re.wall_roughness using an approximation formula.'::text WHEN ((re.clear_height IS NULL) AND (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'The default value stored in reach.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction is used'::text ELSE 'Default value 0.01 is used as roughness'::text END WHEN ((re.coefficient_of_friction IS NULL) AND (re.wall_roughness IS NULL)) THEN CASE WHEN (re.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction IS NOT NULL) THEN concat('The default value stored in reach.swmm_default_coefficient_of_friction is used') ELSE 'Default value 0.01 is used as roughness'::text END ELSE 'Default value 0.01 is used as roughness'::text END, CASE WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3350) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': circular profile with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3351) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': egg profile with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3352) THEN CASE WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': arch profile with known height_width_ratio value and with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': arch profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio and with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': arch profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio and with known clear_height value') END ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3353) THEN CASE WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': rectangular profile with known height_width_ratio value and with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': rectangular profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio and with default value of 0.1m as clear_height') ELSE concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': rectangular profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio and with known clear_height value') END ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3354) THEN CASE WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': parabolic profile with known height_width_ratio value, default value of 0.1m as clear_height and no code value') ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN ((re.clear_height = 0) OR (re.clear_height IS NULL)) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': parabolic profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio, with default value of 0.1m as clear_height and no code value') ELSE concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': parabolic profile with default value of 1 as height_width_ratio, with known clear_height value and no code value') END ELSE NULL::text END WHEN (vl_pp.vsacode = 3355) THEN concat('Reach', re.obj_id, ': custom profile to be defined in SWMM') ELSE NULL::text END, CASE WHEN (to_wn.obj_id IS NULL) THEN 'Blind connection, the destination node must be edited'::text WHEN ((from_wn.obj_id IS NULL) AND (to_wn.obj_id IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'No from node, a junction was automatically created for the export.'::text ELSE NULL::text END) AS description, cfhy.value_en AS tag, (st_curvetoline(st_force3d(re.progression3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineStringZ,2056) AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws.status = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, re.obj_id FROM (((((((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.pipe_profile pp ON (((pp.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_pipe_profile)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.pipe_profile_profile_type vl_pp ON ((pp.profile_type = vl_pp.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (re.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_from ON (((rp_from.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_from)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_to ON (((rp_to.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_to)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node from_wn ON (((from_wn.obj_id)::text = (rp_from.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node to_wn ON (((to_wn.obj_id)::text = (rp_to.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = ch.function_hierarchic))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hydraulic cfhy ON ((cfhy.code = ch.function_hydraulic))) WHERE (ws.status = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]));

table.name: swmm_vw_coordinates
table.viewSql: SELECT swmm_vw_junctions.name AS node, round((st_x(swmm_vw_junctions.geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y(swmm_vw_junctions.geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, swmm_vw_junctions.state, swmm_vw_junctions.hierarchy, swmm_vw_junctions.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_junctions WHERE (swmm_vw_junctions.geom IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT swmm_vw_outfalls.name AS node, round((st_x(swmm_vw_outfalls.geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y(swmm_vw_outfalls.geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, swmm_vw_outfalls.state, swmm_vw_outfalls.hierarchy, swmm_vw_outfalls.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_outfalls WHERE (swmm_vw_outfalls.geom IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT swmm_vw_dividers.name AS node, round((st_x(swmm_vw_dividers.geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y(swmm_vw_dividers.geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, swmm_vw_dividers.state, swmm_vw_dividers.hierarchy, swmm_vw_dividers.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_dividers WHERE (swmm_vw_dividers.geom IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT swmm_vw_storages.name AS node, round((st_x(swmm_vw_storages.geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y(swmm_vw_storages.geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, swmm_vw_storages.state, swmm_vw_storages.hierarchy, swmm_vw_storages.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_storages WHERE (swmm_vw_storages.geom IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT swmm_vw_raingages.name AS node, round((st_x(swmm_vw_raingages.geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y(swmm_vw_raingages.geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, swmm_vw_raingages.state, swmm_vw_raingages.hierarchy, swmm_vw_raingages.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_raingages WHERE (swmm_vw_raingages.geom IS NOT NULL);

table.name: swmm_vw_coverages
table.viewSql: SELECT sub.name AS subcatchment, pzk.value_en AS landuse, (round(((st_area(st_intersection(sub.geom, pz.perimeter_geometry)) / st_area(sub.geom)))::numeric, 2) * (100)::numeric) AS percent, sub.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_subcatchments sub, (tww_od.dss15_planning_zone pz LEFT JOIN tww_vl.dss15_planning_zone_kind pzk ON ((pz.kind = pzk.code))) WHERE (st_intersects(sub.geom, pz.perimeter_geometry) AND st_isvalid(sub.geom) AND st_isvalid(pz.perimeter_geometry)) ORDER BY sub.name, (round(((st_area(st_intersection(sub.geom, pz.perimeter_geometry)) / st_area(sub.geom)))::numeric, 2) * (100)::numeric) DESC;

table.name: swmm_vw_curves
table.viewSql: ( SELECT (concat('pump_curve@', pu.obj_id))::character varying AS name, CASE WHEN (row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY pu.obj_id ORDER BY pu.obj_id, hq.altitude) = 1) THEN 'Pump4'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS type, hq.altitude AS xvalue, hq.flow AS yvalue, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM ((((((((tww_od.hq_relation hq LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((hq.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.pump pu ON (((pu.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) AND (vl_oc_ki.vsacode = 6220) AND (pu.obj_id IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY pu.obj_id, hq.altitude) UNION ALL ( SELECT (concat('prank_weir_curve@', pw.obj_id))::character varying AS name, CASE WHEN (row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY pw.obj_id ORDER BY pw.obj_id, hq.altitude) = 1) THEN 'Rating'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS type, hq.altitude AS xvalue, hq.flow AS yvalue, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM ((((((((tww_od.hq_relation hq LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((hq.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.prank_weir pw ON (((pw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) AND (vl_oc_ki.vsacode = 6220) AND (pw.obj_id IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY pw.obj_id, hq.altitude) UNION ALL ( SELECT (concat('storageCurve@', wn.obj_id))::character varying AS name, CASE WHEN (row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY wn.obj_id ORDER BY wn.obj_id, hr.water_depth) = 1) THEN 'Storage'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS type, hr.water_depth AS xvalue, hr.water_surface AS yvalue, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((tww_od.hydr_geom_relation hr LEFT JOIN tww_od.hydr_geometry hg ON (((hg.obj_id)::text = (hr.fk_hydr_geometry)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((hg.obj_id)::text = (wn.fk_hydr_geometry)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) ORDER BY wn.obj_id, hr.water_depth);

table.name: swmm_vw_dividers
table.viewSql: SELECT ma.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS elevation, '???'::text AS diverted_link, 'CUTOFF'::text AS type, 0 AS cutoffflow, 0 AS maxdepth, 0 AS initialdepth, 0 AS surchargedepth, 0 AS pondedarea, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.manhole ma LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ma.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ne.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.cover co ON (((ws.fk_main_cover)::text = (co.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.manhole_function mf ON ((ma.function = mf.code))) WHERE ((mf.vsacode = 4798) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]))) UNION ALL SELECT ss.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS elevation, '???'::text AS diverted_link, 'CUTOFF'::text AS type, 0 AS cutoffflow, 0 AS maxdepth, 0 AS initialdepth, 0 AS surchargedepth, 0 AS pondedarea, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.special_structure ss LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ss.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, COALESCE(to_wn.obj_id, re.obj_id) AS obj_id FROM (((((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (re.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_to ON (((rp_to.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_to)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node to_wn ON (((to_wn.obj_id)::text = (rp_to.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement we ON (((to_wn.obj_id)::text = (we.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws_node ON (((we.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws_node.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws_st.code = ws.status))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic ch_fh ON ((ch_fh.code = ch.function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) AND (ws_node.* IS NULL));

table.name: swmm_vw_landuses
table.viewSql: SELECT dss15_planning_zone_kind.value_en AS name, 0 AS sweepinginterval, 0 AS fractionavailable, 0 AS lastswept FROM tww_vl.dss15_planning_zone_kind;

table.name: swmm_vw_losses
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT re.obj_id AS link, (0)::double precision AS kentry, (0)::double precision AS kexit, (0)::double precision AS kavg, CASE WHEN (ts.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'YES'::text ELSE 'NO'::text END AS flap_gate, (0)::double precision AS seepage, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (ch_fhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, re.obj_id FROM (((((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (re.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.pipe_profile pp ON (((pp.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_pipe_profile)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_from ON (((rp_from.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_from)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node from_wn ON (((from_wn.obj_id)::text = (rp_from.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.throttle_shut_off_unit ts ON (((ts.fk_wastewater_node)::text = (from_wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ch.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic ch_fhi ON ((ch.function_hierarchic = ch_fhi.code))) WHERE (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]));

table.name: swmm_vw_orifices
table.viewSql: SELECT NULL::text AS name, NULL::text AS fromnode, NULL::text AS tonode, 'SIDE'::text AS type, (0)::text AS "offset", (0.65)::text AS qcoeff, 'NO'::text AS gated, (0)::text AS closetime, NULL::text AS state, NULL::text AS hierarchy, NULL::text AS obj_id LIMIT 0;

table.name: swmm_vw_outfalls
table.viewSql: SELECT wn.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS invertelev, 'FREE'::character varying AS type, NULL::text AS stagedata, 'NO'::character varying AS tide_gate, NULL::character varying AS routeto, ws.identifier AS description, (dp.obj_id)::character varying AS tag, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((tww_od.discharge_point dp LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (dp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement we ON (((we.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (we.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((wn.obj_id IS NOT NULL) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]))) UNION SELECT wn.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS invertelev, 'FREE'::character varying AS type, NULL::text AS stagedata, 'NO'::character varying AS tide_gate, NULL::character varying AS routeto, ws.identifier AS description, (ii.obj_id)::character varying AS tag, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((tww_od.infiltration_installation ii LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ii.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement we ON (((we.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (we.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((wn.obj_id IS NOT NULL) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])));

table.name: swmm_vw_outlets
table.viewSql: SELECT concat('outlet@', pw.obj_id) AS name, of.fk_wastewater_node AS fromnode, of.fk_overflow_to AS tonode, 0 AS "offset", 'TABULAR/DEPTH'::text AS type, concat('prank_weir_curve@', pw.obj_id) AS qtable_qcoeff, NULL::text AS qexpon, 'NO'::text AS gated, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.prank_weir pw LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((pw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) AND (vl_oc_ki.vsacode = 6220));

table.name: swmm_vw_polygons
table.viewSql: SELECT foo.subcatchment, round((st_x((foo.dp).geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y((foo.dp).geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, foo.state, foo.hierarchy, foo.obj_id FROM ( SELECT swmm_vw_subcatchments.name AS subcatchment, st_dumppoints(swmm_vw_subcatchments.geom) AS dp, st_npoints(swmm_vw_subcatchments.geom) AS nvert, swmm_vw_subcatchments.state, swmm_vw_subcatchments.hierarchy, swmm_vw_subcatchments.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_subcatchments) foo WHERE ((foo.dp).path[2] <> foo.nvert);

table.name: swmm_vw_pumps
table.viewSql: SELECT pu.obj_id AS name, of.fk_wastewater_node AS fromnode, of.fk_overflow_to AS tonode, (concat('pump_curve@', pu.obj_id))::character varying AS pumpcurve, 'ON'::character varying AS status, pu.start_level AS startupdepth, pu.stop_level AS shutoffdepth, concat_ws(';'::text, of.identifier, CASE WHEN (oc.obj_id IS NULL) THEN 'No curve will be created for this pump, it has no overflow_characteristic'::text WHEN (vl_oc_ki.vsacode <> 6220) THEN concat(pu.obj_id, 'No curve will be created for this pump, kind_overflow_char is not equal to H/Q, Q/Q relations are not supported by SWMM') ELSE NULL::text END) AS description, (pu.obj_id)::character varying AS tag, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.pump pu LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((pu.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]));

table.name: swmm_vw_storages
table.viewSql: SELECT wn.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS invertelev, COALESCE((co.level - wn.bottom_level), (0)::numeric) AS maxdepth, 0 AS initdepth, CASE WHEN (hr.fk_hydr_geometry IS NOT NULL) THEN 'TABULAR'::text ELSE 'FUNCTIONAL'::text END AS shape, CASE WHEN (hr.fk_hydr_geometry IS NOT NULL) THEN concat('storageCurve@', wn.obj_id) ELSE '0'::text END AS curvecoefficientorcurvename, 0 AS curveexponent, 0 AS curveconstant, 0 AS surchargedepth, 0 AS fevap, NULL::text AS psi, NULL::numeric AS ksat, NULL::text AS imd, ws.identifier AS description, concat_ws(','::text, 'special_structure', ssf.value_en) AS tag, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((((tww_od.special_structure ss LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ss.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement we ON (((we.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (we.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.hydr_geometry hg ON (((hg.obj_id)::text = (wn.fk_hydr_geometry)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT hydr_geom_relation.fk_hydr_geometry FROM tww_od.hydr_geom_relation) hr ON (((hr.fk_hydr_geometry)::text = (hg.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.cover co ON (((ws.fk_main_cover)::text = (co.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.special_structure_function ssf ON ((ss.function = ssf.code))) WHERE ((ssf.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6397, 6398, 3348, 336, 6478, 3673, 3674, 5574, 3675, 3676, 5575, 5576, 3677])) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]))) UNION ALL SELECT wn.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS invertelev, COALESCE((ii.upper_elevation - wn.bottom_level), (0)::numeric) AS maxdepth, 0 AS initdepth, CASE WHEN (hr.fk_hydr_geometry IS NOT NULL) THEN 'TABULAR'::text ELSE 'FUNCTIONAL'::text END AS shape, CASE WHEN (hr.fk_hydr_geometry IS NOT NULL) THEN concat('storageCurve@', wn.obj_id) ELSE '0'::text END AS curvecoefficientorcurvename, 0 AS curveexponent, 0 AS curveconstant, 0 AS surchargedepth, 0 AS fevap, NULL::text AS psi, (((((ii.absorption_capacity * (60)::numeric) * (60)::numeric) / (1000)::numeric) / ii.effective_area) * (1000)::numeric) AS ksat, NULL::text AS imd, ws.identifier AS description, concat_ws(','::text, 'infiltration_installation', iik.value_en) AS tag, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM ((((((((tww_od.infiltration_installation ii LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ii.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement we ON (((we.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (we.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.hydr_geometry hg ON (((hg.obj_id)::text = (wn.fk_hydr_geometry)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT hydr_geom_relation.fk_hydr_geometry FROM tww_od.hydr_geom_relation) hr ON (((hr.fk_hydr_geometry)::text = (hg.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.infiltration_installation_kind iik ON ((ii.kind = iik.code))) WHERE ((iik.vsacode = 276) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]))) UNION ALL SELECT wn.obj_id AS name, COALESCE(wn.bottom_level, (0)::numeric) AS invertelev, COALESCE((wn.backflow_level_current - wn.bottom_level), (0)::numeric) AS maxdepth, 0 AS initdepth, 'FUNCTIONAL'::text AS shape, '0'::text AS curvecoefficientorcurvename, 0 AS curveexponent, 0 AS curveconstant, 0 AS surchargedepth, 0 AS fevap, NULL::text AS psi, NULL::numeric AS ksat, NULL::text AS imd, concat_ws(';'::text, ws.identifier, concat('Storage created for the prank weir: ', pw.obj_id)) AS description, 'Prank weir'::text AS tag, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.prank_weir pw LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((pw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) AND (vl_oc_ki.vsacode = 6220));

table.name: swmm_vw_subcatchments
table.viewSql: SELECT concat(replace((ca.obj_id)::text, ' '::text, '_'::text), '_', ca.state) AS name, (concat('raingage@', replace((ca.obj_id)::text, ' '::text, '_'::text)))::character varying AS raingage, CASE WHEN (ca.state = 'rw_current'::text) THEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current)::text WHEN (ca.state = 'rw_planned'::text) THEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned)::text WHEN (ca.state = 'ww_current'::text) THEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current)::text WHEN (ca.state = 'ww_planned'::text) THEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned)::text ELSE replace((ca.obj_id)::text, ' '::text, '_'::text) END AS outlet, CASE WHEN (ca.surface_area IS NULL) THEN (st_area(ca.perimeter_geometry) / (10000)::double precision) WHEN (ca.surface_area < 0.01) THEN (st_area(ca.perimeter_geometry) / (10000)::double precision) ELSE ((ca.surface_area)::numeric)::double precision END AS area, CASE WHEN (ca.state = 'rw_current'::text) THEN ca.discharge_coefficient_rw_current WHEN (ca.state = 'rw_planned'::text) THEN ca.discharge_coefficient_rw_planned WHEN (ca.state = 'ww_current'::text) THEN ca.discharge_coefficient_ww_current WHEN (ca.state = 'ww_planned'::text) THEN ca.discharge_coefficient_ww_planned ELSE (0)::numeric END AS percimperv, CASE WHEN (ca.wn_geom IS NOT NULL) THEN ((st_maxdistance(ca.wn_geom, st_exteriorring(ca.perimeter_geometry)) + st_distance(ca.wn_geom, st_exteriorring(ca.perimeter_geometry))) / (2)::double precision) ELSE ((st_maxdistance(st_centroid(ca.perimeter_geometry), st_exteriorring(ca.perimeter_geometry)) + st_distance(st_centroid(ca.perimeter_geometry), st_exteriorring(ca.perimeter_geometry))) / (2)::double precision) END AS width, 0.5 AS percslope, 0 AS curblen, NULL::character varying AS snowpack, CASE WHEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN (ca.waste_water_production_current IS NOT NULL) THEN concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from waste_water_production_current') ELSE CASE WHEN ((ca.surface_area IS NOT NULL) AND (ca.surface_area <> (0)::numeric)) THEN concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from surface_area, population_density_current and a default production of 160 Litre / inhabitant /day') ELSE concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from the geometric area, population_density_current and a default production of 160 Litre / inhabitant /day') END END WHEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN (ca.waste_water_production_planned IS NOT NULL) THEN concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from waste_water_production_planned') ELSE CASE WHEN ((ca.surface_area IS NOT NULL) AND (ca.surface_area <> (0)::numeric)) THEN concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from surface_area, population_density_planned and a default production of 160 Litre / inhabitant /day') ELSE concat('catchment_area: ', ca.obj_id, ': DWF baseline is computed from the geometric area, population_density_planned and a default production of 160 Litre / inhabitant /day') END END WHEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current IS NOT NULL) THEN NULL::text WHEN (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned IS NOT NULL) THEN NULL::text ELSE NULL::text END AS description, ca.obj_id AS tag, (st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry))::geometry(Polygon,2056) AS geom, CASE WHEN ((ca.state = 'rw_current'::text) OR (ca.state = 'ww_current'::text)) THEN 'current'::text WHEN ((ca.state = 'rw_planned'::text) OR (ca.state = 'ww_planned'::text)) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'planned'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (ca._function_hierarchic = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, ca.wn_obj_id AS obj_id FROM ( SELECT ca_1.obj_id, ca_1.direct_discharge_current, ca_1.direct_discharge_planned, ca_1.discharge_coefficient_rw_current, ca_1.discharge_coefficient_rw_planned, ca_1.discharge_coefficient_ww_current, ca_1.discharge_coefficient_ww_planned, ca_1.drainage_system_current, ca_1.drainage_system_planned, ca_1.identifier, ca_1.infiltration_current, ca_1.infiltration_planned, ca_1.perimeter_geometry, ca_1.population_density_current, ca_1.population_density_planned, ca_1.remark, ca_1.retention_current, ca_1.retention_planned, ca_1.fk_provider, ca_1.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current, ca_1.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned, ca_1.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned, ca_1.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current, ca_1.fk_special_building_rw_planned, ca_1.fk_special_building_rw_current, ca_1.fk_special_building_ww_planned, ca_1.fk_special_building_ww_current, wn.situation3d_geometry AS wn_geom, 'ww_planned'::text AS state, wn.obj_id AS wn_obj_id, wn._function_hierarchic FROM ((tww_od.catchment_area ca_1 JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (ca_1.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ne.obj_id)::text)))) ca;

table.name: swmm_vw_symbols
table.viewSql: SELECT swmm_vw_raingages.name AS gage, st_x(swmm_vw_raingages.geom) AS xcoord, st_y(swmm_vw_raingages.geom) AS ycoord, swmm_vw_raingages.state, swmm_vw_raingages.hierarchy, swmm_vw_raingages.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_raingages;

table.name: swmm_vw_tags
table.viewSql: SELECT 'Node'::text AS type, swmm_vw_junctions.name, swmm_vw_junctions.tag AS value, swmm_vw_junctions.state, swmm_vw_junctions.hierarchy, swmm_vw_junctions.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_junctions WHERE (swmm_vw_junctions.tag IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT 'Node'::text AS type, swmm_vw_outfalls.name, swmm_vw_outfalls.tag AS value, swmm_vw_outfalls.state, swmm_vw_outfalls.hierarchy, swmm_vw_outfalls.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_outfalls WHERE (swmm_vw_outfalls.tag IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT 'Node'::text AS type, swmm_vw_storages.name, swmm_vw_storages.tag AS value, swmm_vw_storages.state, swmm_vw_storages.hierarchy, swmm_vw_storages.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_storages WHERE (swmm_vw_storages.tag IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT 'Link'::text AS type, swmm_vw_conduits.name, swmm_vw_conduits.tag AS value, swmm_vw_conduits.state, swmm_vw_conduits.hierarchy, swmm_vw_conduits.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_conduits WHERE (swmm_vw_conduits.tag IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT 'Link'::text AS type, swmm_vw_pumps.name, swmm_vw_pumps.tag AS value, swmm_vw_pumps.state, swmm_vw_pumps.hierarchy, swmm_vw_pumps.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_pumps WHERE (swmm_vw_pumps.tag IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT 'Subcatch'::text AS type, swmm_vw_subcatchments.name, swmm_vw_subcatchments.tag AS value, swmm_vw_subcatchments.state, swmm_vw_subcatchments.hierarchy, swmm_vw_subcatchments.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_subcatchments WHERE (swmm_vw_subcatchments.tag IS NOT NULL);

table.name: swmm_vw_vertices
table.viewSql: SELECT foo.link, round((st_x((foo.dp).geom))::numeric, 2) AS x_coord, round((st_y((foo.dp).geom))::numeric, 2) AS y_coord, foo.state, foo.hierarchy, foo.obj_id FROM ( SELECT swmm_vw_conduits.name AS link, st_dumppoints(swmm_vw_conduits.geom) AS dp, st_npoints(swmm_vw_conduits.geom) AS nvert, swmm_vw_conduits.state, swmm_vw_conduits.hierarchy, swmm_vw_conduits.obj_id FROM tww_app.swmm_vw_conduits) foo WHERE (((foo.dp).path[1] <> 1) AND ((foo.dp).path[1] <> foo.nvert));

table.name: swmm_vw_weirs
table.viewSql: SELECT pw.obj_id AS name, of.fk_wastewater_node AS fromnode, of.fk_overflow_to AS tonode, 'SIDEFLOW'::text AS type, COALESCE(wn.backflow_level_current, (0)::numeric) AS crestht, 3.33 AS qcoeff, 'NO'::text AS gated, 0 AS endcond, 0 AS endcoeff, 'YES'::text AS surcharge, NULL::text AS roadwidth, NULL::text AS roadsurf, NULL::text AS coeffcurve, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id, NULL::text AS message FROM (((((((tww_od.prank_weir pw LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((pw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) OR ((vl_oc_ki.vsacode <> 6220) OR (vl_oc_ki.vsacode IS NULL))) UNION ALL SELECT lw.obj_id AS name, of.fk_wastewater_node AS fromnode, of.fk_overflow_to AS tonode, 'SIDEFLOW'::text AS type, COALESCE(wn.backflow_level_current, (0)::numeric) AS crestht, 3.33 AS qcoeff, 'NO'::text AS gated, 0 AS endcond, 0 AS endcoeff, 'YES'::text AS surcharge, NULL::text AS roadwidth, NULL::text AS roadsurf, NULL::text AS coeffcurve, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id, concat('Leaping weirs are not supported by SWMM, ', lw.obj_id, 'see: https://swmm5.org/2013/07/19/leaping-weir-example-in-swmm-5-and-infoswmm-alternative/') AS message FROM (((((((tww_od.leapingweir lw LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((lw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.overflow_char_kind_overflow_char vl_oc_ki ON ((oc.kind_overflow_char = vl_oc_ki.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]));

table.name: swmm_vw_xsections
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT re.obj_id AS link, CASE WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3350) THEN 'CIRCULAR'::text WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3353) THEN 'RECT_CLOSED'::text WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3351) THEN 'EGG'::text WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3355) THEN 'CUSTOM'::text WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3352) THEN 'ARCH'::text WHEN (ppt.vsacode = 3354) THEN 'PARABOLIC'::text ELSE 'CIRCULAR'::text END AS shape, CASE WHEN (re.clear_height = 0) THEN (0.1)::double precision WHEN (re.clear_height IS NULL) THEN (0.1)::double precision ELSE ((re.clear_height)::double precision / (1000)::double precision) END AS geom1, CASE WHEN (ppt.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[3352, 3353, 3354])) THEN CASE WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NOT NULL) THEN CASE WHEN (re.clear_height = 0) THEN ((0.1 / pp.height_width_ratio))::double precision WHEN (re.clear_height IS NULL) THEN ((0.1 / pp.height_width_ratio))::double precision ELSE (((re.clear_height)::double precision / (1000)::double precision) / (pp.height_width_ratio)::double precision) END WHEN (pp.height_width_ratio IS NULL) THEN (0.002)::double precision ELSE (0.002)::double precision END ELSE NULL::double precision END AS geom2, 0 AS geom3, 0 AS geom4, 1 AS barrels, NULL::text AS culvert, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, re.obj_id FROM (((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.pipe_profile pp ON (((pp.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_pipe_profile)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.pipe_profile_profile_type ppt ON ((ppt.code = pp.profile_type))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (re.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = ch.function_hierarchic))) WHERE (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) UNION ALL SELECT pw.obj_id AS link, 'RECT_OPEN'::text AS shape, (pw.level_max - pw.level_min) AS geom1, pw.hydraulic_overflow_length AS geom2, NULL::integer AS geom3, NULL::integer AS geom4, NULL::integer AS barrels, NULL::text AS culvert, CASE WHEN (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[7959, 6529, 6526])) THEN 'planned'::text ELSE 'current'::text END AS state, CASE WHEN (cfhi.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[5062, 5064, 5066, 5068, 5069, 5070, 5071, 5072, 5074])) THEN 'primary'::text ELSE 'secondary'::text END AS hierarchy, wn.obj_id FROM ((((((tww_od.prank_weir pw LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow of ON (((pw.obj_id)::text = (of.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.overflow_char oc ON (((of.fk_overflow_char)::text = (oc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (of.fk_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.wastewater_structure_status ws_st ON ((ws.status = ws_st.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.channel_function_hierarchic cfhi ON ((cfhi.code = wn._function_hierarchic))) WHERE ((ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959])) OR ((oc.kind_overflow_char <> 6220) AND (ws_st.vsacode = ANY (ARRAY[6530, 6533, 8493, 6529, 6526, 7959]))));

table.name: sys_dictionary_value_list
table.viewSql: SELECT p.relname AS vl_name, vl.code, vl.vsacode, vl.value_en, vl.value_de, vl.value_fr, vl.value_it, vl.value_ro, vl.abbr_en, vl.abbr_de, vl.abbr_fr, vl.abbr_it, vl.abbr_ro, vl.active FROM tww_vl.value_list_base vl, pg_class p WHERE (vl.tableoid = p.oid);

table.name: vw_access_aid
table.viewSql: SELECT access_aid.obj_id, access_aid.kind, structure_part.fk_dataowner, structure_part.fk_provider, structure_part.fk_wastewater_structure, structure_part.identifier, structure_part.last_modification, structure_part.remark, structure_part.renovation_demand FROM (tww_od.access_aid LEFT JOIN tww_od.structure_part ON (((structure_part.obj_id)::text = (access_aid.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_backflow_prevention
table.viewSql: SELECT backflow_prevention.obj_id, backflow_prevention.fk_pump, backflow_prevention.fk_throttle_shut_off_unit, backflow_prevention.gross_costs, backflow_prevention.kind, backflow_prevention.year_of_replacement, structure_part.fk_dataowner, structure_part.fk_provider, structure_part.fk_wastewater_structure, structure_part.identifier, structure_part.last_modification, structure_part.remark, structure_part.renovation_demand FROM (tww_od.backflow_prevention LEFT JOIN tww_od.structure_part ON (((structure_part.obj_id)::text = (backflow_prevention.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_benching
table.viewSql: SELECT benching.obj_id, benching.kind, structure_part.fk_dataowner, structure_part.fk_provider, structure_part.fk_wastewater_structure, structure_part.identifier, structure_part.last_modification, structure_part.remark, structure_part.renovation_demand FROM (tww_od.benching LEFT JOIN tww_od.structure_part ON (((structure_part.obj_id)::text = (benching.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_bio_ecol_assessment
table.viewSql: SELECT bio_ecol_assessment.obj_id, bio_ecol_assessment.comparison_last, bio_ecol_assessment.date_last_examen, bio_ecol_assessment.impact_auxiliary_indic, bio_ecol_assessment.impact_external_aspect, bio_ecol_assessment.impact_macroinvertebrates, bio_ecol_assessment.impact_water_plants, bio_ecol_assessment.intervention_demand, bio_ecol_assessment.io_calculation, bio_ecol_assessment.kind_water_body, bio_ecol_assessment.outlet_pipe_clear_height, bio_ecol_assessment.q347, bio_ecol_assessment.relevance_matrix, bio_ecol_assessment.relevant_slope, bio_ecol_assessment.surface_water_bodies, bio_ecol_assessment.water_specific_discharge_freight_nh4_n_current, bio_ecol_assessment.water_specific_discharge_freight_nh4_n_current_opt, bio_ecol_assessment.water_specific_discharge_freight_nh4_n_planned, maintenance_event.base_data, maintenance_event.cost, maintenance_event.data_details, maintenance_event.duration, maintenance_event.fk_dataowner, maintenance_event.fk_measure, maintenance_event.fk_operating_company, maintenance_event.fk_provider, maintenance_event.identifier, maintenance_event.last_modification, maintenance_event.operator, maintenance_event.reason, maintenance_event.remark, maintenance_event.result, maintenance_event.status, maintenance_event.time_point FROM (tww_od.bio_ecol_assessment LEFT JOIN tww_od.maintenance_event ON (((maintenance_event.obj_id)::text = (bio_ecol_assessment.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_building
table.viewSql: SELECT building.obj_id, building.house_number, building.location_name, building.perimeter_geometry, building.reference_point_geometry, connection_object.fk_dataowner, connection_object.fk_provider, connection_object.fk_wastewater_networkelement, connection_object.identifier, connection_object.last_modification, connection_object.remark, connection_object.sewer_infiltration_water_production FROM (tww_od.building LEFT JOIN tww_od.connection_object ON (((connection_object.obj_id)::text = (building.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_catchment_area_additional
table.viewSql: SELECT ca.obj_id, ((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current)::text = (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current)::text) AS current_ww_is_rw, ((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned)::text = (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned)::text) AS planned_ww_is_rw, ((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_planned)::text = (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current)::text) AS ww_planned_is_current, ((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned)::text = (ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current)::text) AS rw_planned_is_current FROM tww_od.catchment_area ca;

table.name: vw_catchment_area_connections
table.viewSql: SELECT ca.obj_id, (st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_rw_current.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056) AS connection_rw_current_geometry, (st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_ww_current.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056) AS connection_ww_current_geometry FROM ((tww_od.catchment_area ca LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn_rw_current ON (((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current)::text = (wn_rw_current.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn_ww_current ON (((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_ww_current)::text = (wn_ww_current.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_catchment_area_rwc_connections
table.viewSql: SELECT ca.obj_id, (st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_rw_current.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056) AS connection_rw_current_geometry, st_length((st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_rw_current.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056)) AS length_rw_current, wn_rw_current.obj_id AS node_rw_current_obj_id FROM (tww_od.catchment_area ca LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn_rw_current ON (((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_current)::text = (wn_rw_current.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_catchment_area_rwp_connections
table.viewSql: SELECT ca.obj_id, (st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_rw_planned.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056) AS connection_rw_planned_geometry, st_length((st_force2d(st_makeline(st_centroid(st_curvetoline(ca.perimeter_geometry)), wn_rw_planned.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(LineString,2056)) AS length_rw_planned, wn_rw_planned.obj_id AS node_rw_planned_obj_id FROM (tww_od.catchment_area ca LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn_rw_planned ON (((ca.fk_wastewater_networkelement_rw_planned)::text = (wn_rw_planned.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_catchment_area_totals_aggregated
table.viewSql: SELECT ca_tot.obj_id, (round(ca_agg.population))::integer AS population, ca_agg.surface_area, ca_agg.surface_imp, ca_agg.surface_red, ca_agg.sewer_infiltration_water, ca_agg.waste_water_production, (round(ca_agg.population_dim))::integer AS population_dim, ca_agg.surface_dim, ca_agg.surface_imp_dim, ca_agg.surface_red_dim, ca_agg.sewer_infiltration_water_dim, ca_agg.waste_water_production_dim FROM (((tww_od.catchment_area_totals ca_tot LEFT JOIN tww_od.hydraulic_char_data hcd ON (((hcd.obj_id)::text = (ca_tot.fk_hydraulic_char_data)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((hcd.fk_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( WITH RECURSIVE log_card_tree AS ( SELECT log_card.obj_id, log_card.fk_next_special_building, ARRAY[(log_card.obj_id)::character varying] AS log_card_path FROM tww_od.log_card WHERE (log_card.fk_next_special_building IS NULL) UNION ALL SELECT lc_1.obj_id, lc_1.fk_next_special_building, (lt.log_card_path || lc_1.obj_id) FROM (tww_od.log_card lc_1 JOIN log_card_tree lt ON (((lc_1.fk_next_special_building)::text = (lt.obj_id)::text))) ), log_card_agg AS ( SELECT log_card_tree.obj_id AS child, unnest(log_card_tree.log_card_path) AS parent FROM log_card_tree ), ca AS ( SELECT catchment_area.obj_id, catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_current AS fk_log_card, ((catchment_area.population_density_current)::numeric * catchment_area.surface_area) AS population, catchment_area.surface_area, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.seal_factor_ww_current) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_imp, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.discharge_coefficient_ww_current) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_red, catchment_area.sewer_infiltration_water_production_current AS sewer_infiltration_water, catchment_area.waste_water_production_current AS waste_water_production, 0 AS population_dim, 0 AS surface_dim, 0 AS surface_imp_dim, 0 AS surface_red_dim, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water_dim, 0 AS waste_water_production_dim FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_current IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL SELECT catchment_area.obj_id, catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_current AS fk_log_card, 0 AS population, CASE WHEN ((catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_current)::text = (catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_current)::text) THEN (0)::numeric ELSE catchment_area.surface_area END AS surface_area, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.seal_factor_rw_current) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_imp, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.discharge_coefficient_rw_current) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_red, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water, 0 AS waste_water_production, 0 AS population_dim, 0 AS surface_dim, 0 AS surface_imp_dim, 0 AS surface_red_dim, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water_dim, 0 AS waste_water_production_dim FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_current IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL SELECT catchment_area.obj_id, catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_planned AS fk_log_card, 0 AS population, 0 AS surface_area, 0 AS surface_imp, 0 AS surface_red, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water, 0 AS waste_water_production, ((catchment_area.population_density_planned)::numeric * catchment_area.surface_area) AS population_dim, catchment_area.surface_area AS surface_dim, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.seal_factor_ww_planned) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_imp_dim, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.discharge_coefficient_ww_planned) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_red_dim, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water_dim, 0 AS waste_water_production_dim FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_planned IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL SELECT catchment_area.obj_id, catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_planned AS fk_log_card, 0 AS population, 0 AS surface_area, 0 AS surface_imp, 0 AS surface_red, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water, 0 AS waste_water_production, 0 AS population_dim, CASE WHEN ((catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_planned)::text = (catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_planned)::text) THEN (0)::numeric ELSE catchment_area.surface_area END AS surface_dim, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.seal_factor_rw_planned) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_imp_dim, ((catchment_area.surface_area * catchment_area.discharge_coefficient_rw_planned) / (100)::numeric) AS surface_red_dim, 0 AS sewer_infiltration_water_dim, 0 AS waste_water_production_dim FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_planned IS NOT NULL) ), ca_sums AS ( SELECT main_lc.obj_id, main_lc.fk_pwwf_wastewater_node, sum(ca.population) AS population, sum(ca.surface_area) AS surface_area, sum(ca.surface_imp) AS surface_imp, sum(ca.surface_red) AS surface_red, sum(ca.sewer_infiltration_water) AS sewer_infiltration_water, sum(ca.waste_water_production) AS waste_water_production, sum(ca.population_dim) AS population_dim, sum(ca.surface_dim) AS surface_dim, sum(ca.surface_imp_dim) AS surface_imp_dim, sum(ca.surface_red_dim) AS surface_red_dim, sum(ca.sewer_infiltration_water_dim) AS sewer_infiltration_water_dim, sum(ca.waste_water_production_dim) AS waste_water_production_dim FROM ((ca LEFT JOIN tww_od.log_card lc_1 ON (((ca.fk_log_card)::text = (lc_1.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.log_card main_lc ON (((main_lc.obj_id)::text = (lc_1.fk_main_structure)::text))) GROUP BY main_lc.obj_id ) SELECT lca.parent AS obj_id, lc.fk_pwwf_wastewater_node, sum(ca_sums_c.population) AS population, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_area) AS surface_area, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_imp) AS surface_imp, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_red) AS surface_red, sum(ca_sums_c.sewer_infiltration_water) AS sewer_infiltration_water, sum(ca_sums_c.waste_water_production) AS waste_water_production, sum(ca_sums_c.population_dim) AS population_dim, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_dim) AS surface_dim, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_imp_dim) AS surface_imp_dim, sum(ca_sums_p.surface_red_dim) AS surface_red_dim, lc ON (((lca.parent)::text = (lc.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN ca_sums ca_sums_c ON (((ca_sums_c.obj_id)::text = (lca.child)::text))) LEFT JOIN ca_sums ca_sums_p ON (((ca_sums_p.obj_id)::text = (lca.parent)::text))) GROUP BY lca.parent, lc.fk_pwwf_wastewater_node) ca_agg ON (((ca_agg.fk_pwwf_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_change_points
table.viewSql: SELECT ne_node.obj_id, wn.situation3d_geometry AS geom, (re.material <> re_next.material) AS change_in_material, (re.clear_height <> re_next.clear_height) AS change_in_clear_height, (((rp_from.level - rp_to.level) / re.length_effective) - ((rp_next_from.level - rp_next_to.level) / re_next.length_effective)) AS change_in_slope FROM (((((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_to ON (((rp_to.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_to)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_from ON (((rp_from.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_from)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne_node ON (((ne_node.obj_id)::text = (rp_to.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ne_node.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_next_from ON (((rp_next_from.fk_wastewater_networkelement)::text = (ne_node.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach re_next ON (((rp_next_from.obj_id)::text = (re_next.fk_reach_point_from)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_next_to ON (((rp_next_to.obj_id)::text = (re_next.fk_reach_point_to)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((re.obj_id)::text = (ne.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne_next ON (((re_next.obj_id)::text = (ne_next.obj_id)::text))) WHERE ((ne_next.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text);

table.name: vw_network_node
table.viewSql: WITH cover_levels_per_network_element AS ( SELECT ne_1.obj_id, max(co_1.level) AS level FROM (((tww_od.cover co_1 JOIN tww_od.structure_part sp ON (((co_1.obj_id)::text = (sp.obj_id)::text))) JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws_1 ON (((sp.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws_1.obj_id)::text))) JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne_1 ON (((ws_1.obj_id)::text = (ne_1.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) GROUP BY ne_1.obj_id ) SELECT n.id AS gid, CASE WHEN (n.node_type = 'reach_point'::text) THEN n.rp_id WHEN (n.node_type = 'wastewater_node'::text) THEN n.ne_id ELSE ((n.ne_id || '-BLIND-'::text) || row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY n.node_type, n.ne_id ORDER BY (st_x(n.geom)))) END AS obj_id, n.node_type AS type, CASE WHEN (n.node_type = 'reach_point'::text) THEN 'reach_point'::text WHEN (mh.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'manhole'::text WHEN (ws.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'special_structure'::text ELSE 'other'::text END AS node_type, CASE WHEN (n.node_type = 'reach_point'::text) THEN rp.level WHEN (n.node_type = 'wastewater_node'::text) THEN nd.bottom_level ELSE NULL::numeric END AS level, NULL::text AS usage_current, co.level AS cover_level, NULL::double precision AS backflow_level_current, CASE WHEN (n.node_type = 'reach_point'::text) THEN rp.identifier WHEN (n.node_type = 'wastewater_node'::text) THEN ne.identifier ELSE ((ne.identifier || '-BLIND-'::text) || row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY n.node_type, n.ne_id ORDER BY (st_x(n.geom)))) END AS description, n.geom AS situation_geometry, n.geom AS detail_geometry FROM ((((((tww_od.network_node n LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp ON ((n.rp_id = (rp.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON ((n.ne_id = (ne.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node nd ON ((n.ne_id = (nd.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN cover_levels_per_network_element co ON (((n.ne_id = (co.obj_id)::text) AND (n.node_type = 'wastewater_node'::text)))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ws.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.manhole mh ON (((mh.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_network_segment
table.viewSql: SELECT s.id AS gid, COALESCE(s.ne_id, CASE WHEN (n1.type = 'wastewater_node'::text) THEN n1.obj_id WHEN (n2.type = 'wastewater_node'::text) THEN n2.obj_id ELSE ''::text END) AS obj_id, s.segment_type AS type, r.clear_height, st_length(s.geom) AS length_calc, st_length(r.progression3d_geometry) AS length_full, n1.obj_id AS from_obj_id, n2.obj_id AS to_obj_id, n1.obj_id AS from_obj_id_interpolate, n2.obj_id AS to_obj_id_interpolate, 0 AS from_pos, 1 AS to_pos, CASE WHEN (s.segment_type = 'reach'::text) THEN NULL::numeric WHEN ((n1.level IS NOT NULL) AND (n2.level IS NOT NULL)) THEN GREATEST(n1.level, n2.level) ELSE COALESCE(n1.level, n2.level) END AS bottom_level, ch.usage_current, mat.abbr_de AS material, s.geom AS progression_geometry, s.geom AS detail_geometry FROM ((((((tww_od.network_segment s JOIN tww_app.vw_network_node n1 ON ((n1.gid = s.from_node))) JOIN tww_app.vw_network_node n2 ON ((n2.gid = s.to_node))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach r ON (((r.obj_id)::text = s.ne_id))) LEFT JOIN tww_vl.reach_material mat ON ((r.material = mat.code))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = s.ne_id))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text)));

sm.installation_number AS sm_installation_number, sm.remote_monitoring AS sm_remote_monitoring, dt.kind AS to_kind, wn.obj_id AS wn_obj_id, wn.backflow_level_current AS wn_backflow_level_current, wn._function_hierarchic AS _channel_function_hierarchic FROM ((((((((((((tww_od.wastewater_structure ws LEFT JOIN tww_od.cover main_co ON (((main_co.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_cover)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.structure_part main_co_sp ON (((main_co_sp.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_cover)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wwtp_structure wt ON (((wt.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.small_treatment_plant sm ON (((sm.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.drainless_toilet dt ON (((dt.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.manhole ma ON (((ma.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.special_structure ss ON (((ss.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.discharge_point dp ON (((dp.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.infiltration_installation ii ON (((ii.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) WHERE ((('-1'::text = ALL ((ARRAY[ch.obj_id, ma.obj_id, ss.obj_id, dp.obj_id, ii.obj_id])::text[])) IS NULL) AND (('-2'::text = ALL ((ARRAY[ch.obj_id, ma.obj_id, ss.obj_id, dp.obj_id, ii.obj_id])::text[])) IS NULL));

table.viewSql: SELECT cat.obj_id, cat.discharge_freight_nh4_n, cat.discharge_proportion_nh4_n, cat.identifier, cat.population, cat.population_dim, cat.sewer_infiltration_water, cat.surface_area, cat.surface_dim, cat.surface_imp, cat.surface_imp_dim, cat.surface_red, cat.surface_red_dim, cat.waste_water_production, cat.last_modification, cat.fk_dataowner, cat.fk_provider, cat.fk_discharge_point, cat.fk_hydraulic_char_data, lc.obj_id AS fk_log_card, ca_agg.perimeter_geometry, wn.situation3d_geometry, wn.obj_id AS wn_obj_id FROM ((((tww_od.catchment_area_totals cat LEFT JOIN tww_od.hydraulic_char_data hcd ON ((((hcd.obj_id)::text = (cat.fk_hydraulic_char_data)::text) AND (hcd.status = 6372)))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((hcd.fk_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.log_card lc ON (((lc.fk_pwwf_wastewater_node)::text = (wn.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( WITH ca AS ( SELECT catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_current AS fk_log_card, catchment_area.perimeter_geometry AS geom FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_ww_current IS NOT NULL) UNION SELECT catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_current AS fk_log_card, catchment_area.perimeter_geometry AS geom FROM tww_od.catchment_area WHERE (catchment_area.fk_special_building_rw_current IS NOT NULL) ), collector AS ( SELECT main_lc.obj_id, ca.geom FROM ((ca LEFT JOIN tww_od.log_card lc_1 ON (((ca.fk_log_card)::text = (lc_1.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.log_card main_lc ON (((main_lc.obj_id)::text = (lc_1.fk_main_structure)::text))) ) SELECT collector.obj_id, st_unaryunion(st_collect(collector.geom)) AS perimeter_geometry FROM collector GROUP BY collector.obj_id) ca_agg ON (((ca_agg.obj_id)::text = (lc.obj_id)::text)));

rp_from.fk_dataowner AS rp_from_fk_dataowner, rp_from.fk_provider AS rp_from_fk_provider, rp_from.fk_wastewater_networkelement AS rp_from_fk_wastewater_networkelement, rp_from.identifier AS rp_from_identifier, rp_from.last_modification AS rp_from_last_modification, rp_from.level AS rp_from_level, rp_from.outlet_shape AS rp_from_outlet_shape, rp_from.pipe_closure AS rp_from_pipe_closure, rp_from.position_of_connection AS rp_from_position_of_connection, rp_from.remark AS rp_from_remark, rp_to.obj_id AS rp_to_obj_id, rp_to.elevation_accuracy AS rp_to_elevation_accuracy, rp_to.fk_dataowner AS rp_to_fk_dataowner, rp_to.fk_provider AS rp_to_fk_provider, rp_to.fk_wastewater_networkelement AS rp_to_fk_wastewater_networkelement, rp_to.identifier AS rp_to_identifier, rp_to.last_modification AS rp_to_last_modification, rp_to.level AS rp_to_level, rp_to.outlet_shape AS rp_to_outlet_shape, rp_to.pipe_closure AS rp_to_pipe_closure, rp_to.position_of_connection AS rp_to_position_of_connection, rp_to.remark AS rp_to_remark FROM ((((((tww_od.reach re LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (re.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_from ON (((rp_from.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_from)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.reach_point rp_to ON (((rp_to.obj_id)::text = (re.fk_reach_point_to)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_structure ws ON (((ne.fk_wastewater_structure)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.pipe_profile pp ON (((re.fk_pipe_profile)::text = (pp.obj_id)::text)));

table.name: vw_tww_wastewater_structure
table.viewSql: SELECT ws.identifier, CASE WHEN (ma.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'manhole'::text WHEN (ss.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'special_structure'::text WHEN (dp.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'discharge_point'::text WHEN (ii.obj_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'infiltration_installation'::text ELSE 'unknown'::text END AS ws_type, ma.function AS ma_function, ss.function AS ss_function, ws.fk_owner, ws.status, ws.obj_id, ws._depth, ws.accessibility, ws.condition_score, ws.contract_section, ws.elevation_determination, ws.financing, ws.fk_dataowner, ws.fk_operator, ws.fk_provider, ws.gross_costs, ws.structure_condition, ws.subsidies, ws.urgency_figure, ws.year_of_construction, ws.year_of_replacement, main_co_sp.identifier AS co_identifier, main_co_sp.remark AS co_remark, main_co_sp.renovation_demand AS co_renovation_demand, main_co.obj_id AS co_obj_id, main_co.brand AS co_brand, main_co.cover_shape AS co_shape, main_co.diameter AS co_diameter, main_co.fastening AS co_fastening, main_co.level AS co_level, main_co.material AS co_material, main_co.positional_accuracy AS co_positional_accuracy, main_co.sludge_bucket AS co_sludge_bucket, main_co.venting AS co_venting, (st_force2d(COALESCE(wn.situation3d_geometry, main_co.situation3d_geometry)))::geometry(Point,2056) AS situation3d_geometry, ma._orientation AS ma_orientation, ma.amphibian_exit AS ma_amphibian_exit, ma.dimension1 AS ma_dimension1, ma.dimension2 AS ma_dimension2, ma.material AS ma_material, ma.possibility_intervention AS ma_possibility_intervention, ma.surface_inflow AS ma_surface_inflow, ss.amphibian_exit AS ss_amphibian_exit, ss.bypass AS ss_bypass, ss.emergency_overflow AS ss_emergency_overflow, ss.possibility_intervention AS ss_possibility_intervention, ss.stormwater_tank_arrangement AS ss_stormwater_tank_arrangement, ss.upper_elevation AS ss_upper_elevation, ii.absorption_capacity AS ii_absorption_capacity, ii.defects AS ii_defects, ii.dimension1 AS ii_dimension1, ii.dimension2 AS ii_dimension2, ii.distance_to_aquifer AS ii_distance_to_aquifer, ii.effective_area AS ii_effective_area, ii.emergency_overflow AS ii_emergency_overflow, ii.filling_material AS ii_filling_material, ii.fk_dss15_aquifer AS ii_fk_dss15_aquifer, ii.kind AS ii_kind, ii.labeling AS ii_labeling, ii.seepage_utilization AS ii_seepage_utilization, ii.upper_elevation AS ii_upper_elevation, ii.vehicle_access AS ii_vehicle_access, ii.watertightness AS ii_watertightness, dp.highwater_level AS dp_highwater_level, dp.relevance AS dp_relevance, dp.terrain_level AS dp_terrain_level, dp.upper_elevation AS dp_upper_elevation, dp.water_course_number AS dp_water_course_number, dp.water_course_segment_canton AS dp_water_course_segment_canton, dp.waterlevel_hydraulic AS dp_waterlevel_hydraulic, wn.obj_id AS wn_obj_id, wn.backflow_level_current AS wn_backflow_level_current, wn.bottom_level AS wn_bottom_level, wn.elevation_accuracy AS wn_elevation_accuracy, wn.fk_hydr_geometry AS wn_fk_hydr_geometry, wn.function_node_amelioration AS wn_function_node_amelioration, wn.wwtp_number AS wn_wwtp_number, ne.fk_dataowner AS wn_fk_dataowner, ne.fk_provider AS wn_fk_provider, ne.fk_wastewater_structure AS wn_fk_wastewater_structure, ne.identifier AS wn_identifier, ne.last_modification AS wn_last_modification, ne.remark AS wn_remark, ws._label, ws._cover_label, ws._bottom_label, ws._input_label, ws._output_label, wn._usage_current AS _channel_usage_current, wn._function_hierarchic AS _channel_function_hierarchic FROM ((((((((((((tww_od.wastewater_structure ws LEFT JOIN tww_od.cover main_co ON (((main_co.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_cover)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.structure_part main_co_sp ON (((main_co_sp.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_cover)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.manhole ma ON (((ma.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.special_structure ss ON (((ss.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.discharge_point dp ON (((dp.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.infiltration_installation ii ON (((ii.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_networkelement ne ON (((ne.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wastewater_node wn ON (((wn.obj_id)::text = (ws.fk_main_wastewater_node)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.channel ch ON (((ch.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.wwtp_structure wt ON (((wt.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.small_treatment_plant sm ON (((sm.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) LEFT JOIN tww_od.drainless_toilet dt ON (((dt.obj_id)::text = (ws.obj_id)::text))) WHERE ((('-1'::text = ALL ((ARRAY[ch.obj_id, dt.obj_id, sm.obj_id, wt.obj_id])::text[])) IS NULL) AND (('-2'::text = ALL ((ARRAY[ch.obj_id, dt.obj_id, sm.obj_id, wt.obj_id])::text[])) IS NULL));

BEGIN UPDATE tww_od.wastewater_structure SET _bottom_label = NEW._bottom_label , _cover_label = NEW._cover_label , _depth = NEW._depth , _input_label = NEW._input_label , _label = NEW._label , _output_label = NEW._output_label , accessibility = NEW.accessibility , condition_score = NEW.condition_score , contract_section = NEW.contract_section , detail_geometry3d_geometry = NEW.detail_geometry3d_geometry , elevation_determination = NEW.elevation_determination , financing = NEW.financing , fk_dataowner = NEW.fk_dataowner , fk_main_cover = NEW.fk_main_cover , fk_main_wastewater_node = NEW.fk_main_wastewater_node , fk_operator = NEW.fk_operator , fk_owner = NEW.fk_owner , fk_provider = NEW.fk_provider , gross_costs = NEW.gross_costs , identifier = NEW.identifier , inspection_interval = NEW.inspection_interval , last_modification = NEW.last_modification , location_name = NEW.location_name , records = NEW.records , remark = NEW.remark , renovation_necessity = NEW.renovation_necessity , replacement_value = NEW.replacement_value , rv_base_year = NEW.rv_base_year , rv_construction_type = NEW.rv_construction_type , status = NEW.status , status_survey_year = NEW.status_survey_year , structure_condition = NEW.structure_condition , subsidies = NEW.subsidies , urgency_figure = NEW.urgency_figure , year_of_construction = NEW.year_of_construction , year_of_replacement = NEW.year_of_replacement WHERE obj_id = OLD.obj_id;
